ai-patthana22.2:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.2:0.3_0: proceeding in the heaven of the skillful,
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_0: Not knowing the Truth, the unskillful is not its cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_1: No matter what is unkilled by the undeclared points for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_3: There’s no declared by the cause or condition for the reason for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_4: No by nature, nor by the reason for this.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_5: No cause or reason for the sake of doing unskillful and not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_0: No cause is a reason for cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the undeclared points for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_3: No by nature, nor by nature, nor by declared causes and reasons cause and reasons this.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_4: No by nature, nor by declared: ‘This is a cause of unskillful’. And because of this has not been declared by the reason for cause, cause and reason.’
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_5: No cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.2:4.1_0: three things that rely on letting go, three kinds of million ...
